New Records: South Africa were bowled out for their lowest total in T20Is, 87 runs.
Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik scored his first half-century in T20Is, making 55 runs.
Avesh Khan took 4 wickets for 18 runs, his career-best figures.
India won by 82 runs, their biggest win over South Africa and fifth-biggest in T20Is.
South Africa's captain, Temba Bavuma, retired hurt with an elbow injury.
South Africa lost their last five wickets for just 13 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a surface with uneven bounce.
Lungi Ngidi returned to T20I cricket and took 2 wickets for 20 runs.
Rishabh Pant struggled with the bat, getting out to wide deliveries.
Marco Jansen was hit behind the ear by an Avesh Khan bouncer but passed his concussion test.
Yuzvendra Chahal dismissed Heinrich Klaasen, continuing his success against him on spinner-friendly surfaces.
